Study Title: Comparison of High-Dose Methotrexate (HDM) Plus Doxorubicin to HDM Plus Etoposide-Ifosfamide in Osteosarcoma Children
Brief Summary: The purpose of this study is to compare two preoperative chemotherapy regimens based on high-dose methotrexate courses given alternately either with doxorubicin or with etoposide-ifosfamide.
Conditions: Osteosarcoma|Localised High Grade Osteosarcoma of the Limbs
Interventions: DRUG: Etoposide, Ifosfamide, Methotrexate|DRUG: Doxorubicin, Methotrexate
Primary Outcome Measures: Good histological response (5% or less viable cells) after preoperative chemotherapy
Sponsor: Gustave Roussy, Cancer Campus, Grand Paris
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
